reviewText: The movies are classics and the price is excellent. A must have for Christmas movie buffs.
This was a great buy for the Grandchildren and even myself. Three great classics on here in one box! Love it!
This was a gift to my mom great price for four movies . They came in a nice collectable box and there great movies

This collection is just what I have been looking for . So wonderful for the entire family year after year and to lend to friends.
Everyone who remembers their childhood with the great actors of old and new will have a treat. Thanks for putting them all together.
  Moonbean 9 on the horizon!

This set was especially ordered for three of the four movies, and in particular for "Prancer".  The young girl who played Sam Elliot's daughter deserved an Oscar for her performance in this movie.  This story pulls at one's heartstrings, about family, neighbors, community, kindnesses to other, and opening oneself up to friendship and love.  Our family love that movie, but enjoyed "Miracle on 34th", "Home Alone II" was especially enjoyed by the grandchildren.  Since our family is big on decorating for the holidays, inside and out, a movie about competition in outdoor decorating was enjoyed as well.  Strongly recommend this for good family entertainment.
The Dvd was exactly what I wanted and arrived in time for Christmas, Everyone enjoyed watching it, Price was good and arrived in Australia with no problems
This is a great collection of movies and I was happy to find it all together like this.  We watched almost all over Christmas and loved them.

I couldn't believe i could get all of these movies in one package and for such a a great price. I had several people where I was able to find this package deal, I didn't hesitate one second letting them know.

This is basically a good value in a holiday movie box set, each title having its own slimline case but BE WARNED: the disc of the 1947 version of Miracle on 34th Street is the colorized version contained in the 2-disc special edition. I for one am not a fan of messing with original versions of films for marketings' sake. Fox could just have easily inserted the original version disc with all the special features instead of the colorized version. For this reason this product loses two stars.
Perfect condition
Great collection of Christmas movies at a great price. My children love all the movies and are still watching them even though the holidays have passed.
Good movies for the Christmas season. 4 movies on 4 disc set
was ok for the price.  shared it with church friends
didn't care for Deck the halls, otherwise good value for 4 movies!
Love!
Gift for my daughter and her family.  One of the only ways to get Home Alone 2, Prancer AND the original Miracle on 34th Street.
GOOD CHRISTMAS FAVORITES
Every good movie!
A really great collection for the season.
I love the movies. They are the best.
Perfect holiday box set!
Everything was just as expected

Miracle on 34th Street, Home Alone 2 are 2 of my absolute favorite Christmas movies. So I am super happy with this purchase the quality of the DVD is very good. Deck the Halls is cute so I am happy to have added it to my collection. Prancer I haven't watched yet. I did watch it a few times as a kid and remember it being very sad.
I came from Berrien County which is where Three Oaks, Michigan is located.  Fun to watch when you know the area.  Three Oaks is a charming town!
Grand-daughter is excited to have these for the family!
Had my grandaughter over and we had a movie marathon with these Christmas classics.  All 4 were great, no skips or stops with the dvd's.
Have seen them all many, many times. Wanted to have a copy
love these videos
CHRISTMAS PRESENT FOR A FAMILY, THEY WERE SO EXCITED TO HAVE FOR GREAT MOVIES.
